column1: #Text=Chosen as one of " America 's Greatest Thinkers " ( twice ) by the Great American Think-Off , and dubbed " the Erin Brockovitch of the Bonobo " by Salon , Block is an active advocate of the extremely endangered bonobos , using their highly sexual , non-violent and gender-egalitarian " lifestyle
